# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1086/org/openo/sdno/driver-zte-sptn/standalone/1.0.0/standalone-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f sdno-driver-zte-sptn-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8640
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1086 > OPENO_VERSION
